data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِيهَا comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.
data.sentence: The word وَحِينَ comes from the root ح ي ن and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.
data.sentence: The word حِينَ comes from the root ح ي ن and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Nun) To arrive, come, be at hand (time, season), be fit, be reaped.

data.meanings: To collect a thing or things, to be beautiful, comely in person, good in action/behaviour/moral character, to be moderate, to be pleasing/kind, handsome, decorous/honourable/gracious, to be elegant, to aggregate or make something complete, [Jaml] male camel; ship; palm tree; large sea fish or whale; twisted rope.
data.sentence: The word جَمَالٌ comes from the root ج م ل and is associated with the meanings: To collect a thing or things, to be beautiful, comely in person, good in action/behaviour/moral character, to be moderate, to be pleasing/kind, handsome, decorous/honourable/gracious, to be elegant, to aggregate or make something complete, [Jaml] male camel; ship; palm tree; large sea fish or whale; twisted rope.

data.meanings: Raha - To go or do a thing at evening. Violently windy; good or pleasant wind. Become cool or pleasant [by means of the wind]. Become brisk, lively sprightly, active, agile, or quick [as though one felt the wind and was refreshed by it].Rawahun - he went, journeyed, worked, or did a thing in the evening [or any time of the night or day], or in the afternoon (declining of the sun from its meridian until night).Ruhun - Soul, spirit, vital principle, breath which a man breathes and pervades his whole body. Inspiration or divine revelation [since it is like the vital principle is to the body and quickens man].
data.sentence: The word تُرِيحُونَ comes from the root ر و ح and is associated with the meanings: Raha - To go or do a thing at evening. Violently windy; good or pleasant wind. Become cool or pleasant [by means of the wind]. Become brisk, lively sprightly, active, agile, or quick [as though one felt the wind and was refreshed by it].Rawahun - he went, journeyed, worked, or did a thing in the evening [or any time of the night or day], or in the afternoon (declining of the sun from its meridian until night).Ruhun - Soul, spirit, vital principle, breath which a man breathes and pervades his whole body. Inspiration or divine revelation [since it is like the vital principle is to the body and quickens man].

data.meanings: to send, release, set free, drive to pasture (flock).
data.sentence: The word تَسْرَحُونَ comes from the root س ر ح and is associated with the meanings: to send, release, set free, drive to pasture (flock).
